mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users A, (select a.id as BID, case when b.c_cd = a.posit_cd then b.title end as posit_cd_title from users a, childcd b where 1=1 AND b.c_cd = a.posit_cd) B, (SELECT a.id as CID, case when b.c_cd = a.state_cd then b.title end as state_cd_title from users a, childcd b where 1=1 AND b.c_cd = a.state_cd) C, (SELECT users.id AS DID, CASE WHEN company.company_cd = users.company_cd THEN company.title END AS company_name FROM company, users WHERE 1=1 AND company.company_cd = users.company_cd) D WHERE NOT posit_cd = 'POS001' AND A.id = B.BID AND A.id = C.CID AND A.id = D.DID AND UPPER(A.id) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{mINPUT}) || '%'
